prompt: 1. The widespread ______ of misinformation on social media platforms has forced governments to consider new regulations.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Yanlış bilginin 'yayılması' (dissemination). Diğerleri: yasaklama, şüphe, red, adanmışlık.

prompt: 2. The ancient civilization left behind ______ monuments that have withstood the test of time for thousands of years.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Binlerce yıl dayandığına göre 'muhteşem/görkemli' (magnificent) anıtlar olmalı. Vulnerable (savunmasız), temporary (geçici).

prompt: 3. Companies must ______ their strategies to keep up with the rapidly changing market conditions.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Değişen koşullara ayak uydurmak için stratejileri 'uyarlamak/adapte etmek' (adapt) gerekir.

prompt: 4. The evidence presented in court was so ______ that the jury reached a verdict in less than an hour.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Jüri hemen karar verdiyse kanıt 'ikna edici/güçlü' (compelling) olmalıdır.

prompt: 5. Doctors usually ______ antibiotics only when there is a clear sign of a bacterial infection.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Doktorlar ilaç 'yazar/reçete eder' (prescribe).

prompt: 6. The immense pressure of the deep ocean makes it ______ accessible to human exploration without specialized equipment.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Derin okyanus, ekipmansız 'neredeyse hiç/güçbela' (barely) erişilebilirdir.

prompt: 7. If the dam ______ properly maintained, the flood ______ so much destruction to the valley below.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Type 3 Conditional. Geçmişte bakım yapılsa idi (had been), yapmazdı (would not have caused).

prompt: 8. The scientist is believed ______ the cure by accident while he ______ on a completely different experiment.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Is believed' + 'to have V3' (geçmiş olay). O sırada çalışıyordu (was working).

prompt: 9. ______ the harsh winter conditions, the expedition team managed to reach the summit.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Zor koşullara 'rağmen' (In spite of/Despite) başardılar.

prompt: 10. Global warming is a complex issue that ______ careful consideration ______ a global scale.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Dikkatli düşünmeyi 'gerektirir' (requires). Küresel ölçekte 'ON a global scale'.

prompt: 11. Many species are ______ threat ______ extinction due to habitat loss.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Under threat OF extinction' (yok olma tehdidi altında) kalıbı.

prompt: 12. It is essential that the equipment ______ before every use to ensure safety.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Subjunctive Passive. 'It is essential that... be V3' (kontrol edilsin).

prompt: 13. ______ you practice speaking, the more fluent you will become.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Double Comparative. 'The more... the more' (Ne kadar çok... o kadar çok).

prompt: 14. Hardly had the guests arrived ______ the lights went out.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Hardly... when' kalıbı. Tam gelmişlerdi ki...

prompt: 15. The committee is responsible ______ allocating funds ______ various research projects.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Responsible FOR'. Fonları projelere ayırmak 'allocate TO'.

prompt: 16. ______ advancements in technology, some traditional crafts are disappearing.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Teknolojik gelişmeler 'nedeniyle/yüzünden' (Due to) kayboluyor.

prompt: 17. CLOZE TEST: Bees play a vital role in the ecosystem. (17) ______ pollinating flowers, they help produce a significant portion of the world's food.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'By pollinating' (Polinasyon yaparak) yöntem bildirir.

prompt: 18. However, bee populations are under threat. (18) ______ pesticides and habitat loss are major factors contributing to this decline.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Both... and' yapısı. Hem ilaçlar hem de alan kaybı.

prompt: 19. Scientists warn that a world without bees (19) ______ struggle to feed its growing population.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Hypothetical (hayali) kötü senaryo. 'Would struggle' (zorlanırdı).

prompt: 20. Therefore, efforts to protect bees are (20) ______ important.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Kritik derecede' (critically) önemlidir.

prompt: 21. Everyone can contribute by planting flowers that (21) ______ bees.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Arıları 'çeken/cezbeden' (attract) çiçekler.

prompt: 22. CLOZE TEST 2: Reading is a fundamental skill. (22) ______ it opens doors to knowledge, it also improves cognitive function.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Not only ... but also' yapısında inversion gerekir: 'Not only does it open..., it also improves ...'. Bu yüzden doğru cevap 'Not only does'.

prompt: 23. People who read regularly tend to have (23) ______ vocabularies than those who don't.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Karşılaştırma (Comparative). Okumayanlardan 'daha geniş' (larger).

prompt: 24. Moreover, reading fiction can increase empathy (24) ______ allowing readers to see the world through others' eyes.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'By allowing' (izin vererek/sağlayarak).

prompt: 25. In today's digital age, (25) ______ books are still popular, e-readers are gaining ground.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Kitaplar popüler 'olmasına rağmen/iken' (while), e-kitaplar artıyor.

prompt: 26. Regardless of the format, the benefits of reading remain (26) ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Faydaları 'inkar edilemez' (undeniable).

prompt: 27. ______ , yet it remains one of the most mysterious organs in the human body.
A: Although the brain has been studied for centuries
B: Since neuroscience is a new field
C: Because we know everything about neurons
E: Unless we find a cure for Alzheimer's
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Yet' zıtlık ister. Yüzyıllardır çalışılmasına 'rağmen' (Although), hala gizemlidir.

prompt: 28. Unless strict regulations are implemented to control pollution, ______.
A: urban air quality will continue to deteriorate
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Önlem alınmazsa (Unless), hava kalitesi 'kötüleşmeye devam edecek' (deteriorate).

prompt: 29. Even though she had prepared extensively for the interview, ______.
A: she was too nervous to answer the questions properly
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: İyi hazırlanmasına 'rağmen' (Even though), gerginlikten yapamadı (zıtlık).

prompt: 30. Since the invention of the internet, ______.
A: communication has become instantaneous across the globe
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: İnternet icat edildiğinden 'beri' (Since), iletişim anlık oldu.

prompt: 31. Provided that you follow the instructions carefully, ______.
A: the assembly process should be straightforward
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Talimatlara uyarsan (Provided that), işlem 'basit/düz' (straightforward) olmalı.

prompt: 32. Just as plants need sunlight to grow, ______.
A: children need love and support to thrive
B: animals can survive in the dark
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Just as... (so)...' benzetmesi. Bitkiler ışığa, çocuklar sevgiye muhtaçtır.

prompt: 33. While electric cars are becoming more popular, ______.
A: charging infrastructure is still insufficient in many areas
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Popülerleşiyor 'ama/iken' (While), şarj altyapısı yetersiz (zıtlık).

prompt: 34. Because of the heavy snowfall last night, ______.
A: all schools in the district have been closed
C: people are going to the beach
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Kar yağışı 'yüzünden' (Because of), okullar tatil edildi.

prompt: 35. However hard he tried to explain the situation, ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Ne kadar uğraşsa da (However hard), kimse inanmadı (zıtlık).

prompt: 36. Given the economic recession, ______.
A: companies are cutting down on unnecessary expenses
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Durgunluk 'göz önüne alındığında' (Given), şirketler masrafları kısıyor.

prompt: 37. Although technology has made our lives easier, it has also created new challenges such as cyberbullying and data theft.
A: Teknoloji hayatımızı kolaylaştırmış olmasına rağmen, siber zorbalık ve veri hırsızlığı gibi yeni zorluklar da yaratmıştır.
B: Hayatımızı kolaylaştıran teknoloji, siber zorbalık ve veri hırsızlığına da neden olmuştur.
C: Teknoloji siber zorbalık ve veri hırsızlığı gibi sorunlar yaratsa da hayatımızı kolaylaştırır.
D: Siber zorbalık ve veri hırsızlığı teknolojinin hayatımızı kolaylaştırmasının sonuçlarıdır.
E: Teknoloji sayesinde hayatımız kolaylaştı fakat veri hırsızlığı arttı.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Although' (rağmen), 'made easier' (kolaylaştırmış), 'created new challenges' (yeni zorluklar yaratmış). A şıkkı tam karşılık.

prompt: 38. The ancient city of Ephesus is one of the most well-preserved archaeological sites in the world, attracting millions of tourists annually.
A: Efes antik kenti, her yıl milyonlarca turist çeken, dünyanın en iyi korunmuş arkeolojik alanlarından biridir.
B: Dünyanın en iyi korunmuş arkeolojik alanı olan Efes, her yıl milyonlarca turist çeker.
C: Her yıl milyonlarca turistin ziyaret ettiği Efes, çok iyi korunmuş bir antik kenttir.
D: Efes antik kenti dünyada iyi korunmuştur ve milyonlarca turist çeker.
E: Arkeolojik alanlardan biri olan Efes, her yıl turist akınına uğrar.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'attracting' (çeken - sıfat fiil), 'one of the most well-preserved' (en iyi korunmuşlardan biri). A şıkkı.

prompt: 39. Regular physical activity is essential for maintaining a healthy weight and reducing the risk of chronic diseases.
A: Düzenli fiziksel aktivite, sağlıklı bir kiloyu korumak ve kronik hastalık riskini azaltmak için esastır.
B: Sağlıklı kilo ve kronik hastalıklar için düzenli fiziksel aktivite önemlidir.
C: Kronik hastalık riskini azaltmak istiyorsanız düzenli fiziksel aktivite yapmalısınız.
D: Düzenli fiziksel aktivite sağlıklı kilonun korunmasına yardımcı olur.
E: Fiziksel aktivite düzenli yapılırsa kronik hastalık riski azalır.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Essential' (esas/gerekli), 'maintaining' (korumak), 'reducing' (azaltmak). A şıkkı.

prompt: 40. Çoğu uzman, yapay zekanın gelecekte birçok mesleği dönüştüreceği konusunda hemfikirdir.
A: Most experts agree that artificial intelligence will transform many professions in the future.
B: Experts think artificial intelligence is going to change jobs.
C: Artificial intelligence will transform professions, according to experts.
D: Many professions will be transformed by artificial intelligence in the future.
E: It is agreed by experts that AI transforms jobs.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Most experts agree' (Çoğu uzman hemfikirdir), 'transform' (dönüştüreceği). A şıkkı.

prompt: 41. Başarılı olmak için sadece çok çalışmak yetmez; aynı zamanda hedeflerinize odaklanmalısınız.
A: To be successful, working hard is not enough; you must also focus on your goals.
B: Working hard is not enough for success, so focus on your goals.
C: You should focus on your goals if you want to be successful.
D: Success requires hard work and focus.
E: Not only hard work but also focus is needed for success.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'is not enough' (yetmez), 'must also' (aynı zamanda ...-melisiniz). A şıkkı.

prompt: 42. İklim değişikliğiyle mücadele etmek, uluslararası işbirliği gerektiren küresel bir sorundur.
A: Combating climate change is a global issue that requires international cooperation.
B: Climate change is a global problem requiring cooperation.
C: International cooperation is needed to fight climate change.
D: To combat climate change, nations must cooperate.
E: A global issue like climate change needs cooperation.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Combating' (Mücadele etmek), 'that requires' (gerektiren). A şıkkı.

prompt:
43. READING PASSAGE 1: The Amazon Rainforest is often described as the 'lungs of the Earth' because it produces 20% of the world's oxygen. However, this vital ecosystem is under threat from deforestation. Farmers clear land for agriculture, and loggers cut down trees for wood. This destruction not only leads to a loss of biodiversity but also accelerates climate change by releasing stored carbon dioxide into the atmosphere. Conservation efforts are crucial to protect this unique habitat.

The Amazon Rainforest is called the 'lungs of the Earth' because ______.
A: it produces a significant amount of the world's oxygen
B: it is shaped like a lung
C: it is located in the center of the Earth
D: it consumes all the carbon dioxide
E: it is the only forest in the world
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Dünyanın oksijeninin %20'sini ürettiği için (produces a significant amount of oxygen).

prompt: 44. According to the passage, deforestation in the Amazon ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Karbon salınımı yaparak iklim değişikliğini 'hızlandırır' (accelerates).

prompt: 45. The main threats to the Amazon mentioned in the text are ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Çiftçiler tarım için (farming) ve oduncular ağaç kesimi için (logging) tehdit oluşturuyor.

prompt: 46. The passage emphasizes the need for ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Bu habitatı korumak için 'koruma çabaları' (conservation efforts) hayati önem taşır.

prompt:
47. READING PASSAGE 2: Antibiotics have saved millions of lives since their discovery. However, overuse has led to the rise of 'superbugs'—bacteria that are resistant to treatment. This resistance occurs when bacteria evolve to survive the drugs designed to kill them. To combat this, doctors are now prescribing antibiotics more cautiously, and scientists are searching for new alternatives. Public awareness is also key; patients should not demand antibiotics for viral infections like the cold or flu.

'Superbugs' are defined as bacteria that ______.
A: cannot be killed by standard antibiotics
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Tedaviye dirençli olan (resistant to treatment), yani öldürülemeyen bakterilerdir.

prompt: 48. The rise of antibiotic resistance is primarily caused by ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Aşırı kullanım (overuse) dirence yol açmıştır.

prompt: 49. According to the passage, patients should ______.
A: avoid taking antibiotics for viral infections
C: stop taking medicine when they feel better
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Grip gibi viral enfeksiyonlar için talep etmemeliler (avoid taking for viral).

prompt: 50. To fight resistance, doctors are ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Doktorlar artık 'daha dikkatli/tedbirli' (more cautiously) reçete yazıyorlar.

prompt:
51. READING PASSAGE 3: The Industrial Revolution, starting in the 18th century, marked a major turning point in history. It shifted production from hand tools to machines. While this led to economic growth and urbanization, it also brought challenges. Factories created pollution, and working conditions were often poor. Child labor was common, and workers faced long hours with low pay. Despite these negatives, the revolution paved the way for modern technology and improved standards of living in the long run.

The Industrial Revolution is characterized by ______.
A: a shift from hand tools to machines
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: El aletlerinden makinelere geçiş (shift from hand tools to machines).

prompt: 52. One negative effect of the Industrial Revolution was ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Çalışma koşulları genellikle kötüydü (poor working conditions).

prompt: 53. Urbanization during this period was caused by ______.
A: people moving to cities for factory jobs
C: a lack of food in cities
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Ekonomik büyüme ve fabrikalar şehirleşmeye (urbanization) yol açtı.

prompt: 54. In the long run, the Industrial Revolution ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Uzun vadede yaşam standartlarını 'iyileştirdi' (improved standards of living).

prompt:
55. READING PASSAGE 4: Dolphins are highly intelligent marine mammals known for their social behavior. They live in groups called pods and communicate using a variety of clicks and whistles. Dolphins use echolocation to navigate and find food in murky waters. They send out sound waves that bounce off objects, creating a mental map of their surroundings. This ability is so precise that they can detect a fish from far away. Dolphins are also known to help injured members of their pod, showing a level of empathy rare in the animal kingdom.

Dolphins communicate with each other by ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Clicks and whistles' (tıklamalar ve ıslıklar) kullanarak iletişim kurarlar.

prompt: 56. Echolocation helps dolphins to ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Ekolokasyonu 'yön bulmak ve yemek bulmak' (navigate and find food) için kullanırlar.

prompt: 57. According to the passage, dolphins show empathy by ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Yaralı grup üyelerine yardım ederek (help injured members) empati gösterirler.

prompt: 58. Dolphins' ability to detect objects via sound is described as ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Bu yetenek o kadar 'hassastır/kesindir' (precise) ki uzaktaki balığı algılarlar.

prompt:
59. READING PASSAGE 5: The Great Wall of China is one of the most iconic structures in the world. Built over centuries by different dynasties, its primary purpose was to protect the Chinese empire from invasions by nomadic tribes from the north. The wall stretches for thousands of miles and includes watchtowers, troop barracks, and signaling stations. While it was not completely effective in preventing all invasions, it served as a powerful symbol of the emperor's strength and a means of border control.

The main purpose of the Great Wall was to ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Ana amaç istilalardan 'korumaktı' (protect against invasions).

prompt: 60. The construction of the wall ______.
C: was done by a single emperor
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Farklı hanedanlar tarafından 'yüzyıllar boyunca' (over centuries) inşa edildi.

prompt: 61. Besides defense, the wall served as ______.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: İmparatorun 'gücünün sembolü' (symbol of strength) olarak da hizmet etti.

prompt: 62. According to the passage, the wall ______.
A: was not 100% effective in stopping invasions
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Tüm istilaları önlemede 'tamamen etkili değildi' (not completely effective).

prompt:
63. Jane: I've been feeling really tired lately.
Mary: ______
Jane: I try to, but my job is very stressful.
Mary: Maybe you should try yoga.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Jane 'Deniyorum ama...' dediğine göre, Mary 'Yeterince uyuyor musun?' veya 'Dinleniyor musun?' gibi bir şey sormuştur.

prompt:
64. Sales Manager: Our sales have dropped significantly this quarter.
CEO: ______
Sales Manager: Mainly because a new competitor has entered the market with lower prices.
A: What is the reason for this decline?
B: We need to fire some employees.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Satış Müdürü sebep açıklıyor. CEO 'Bunun sebebi ne?' (What is the reason?) diye sormuştur.

prompt:
65. Customer: I'd like to return this shirt.
Shop Assistant: ______
Customer: It's too small for me.
Shop Assistant: Do you have the receipt?
A: What seems to be the problem with it?
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Müşteri 'Bana küçük geldi' diyor. Satıcı 'Sorun nedir?' (What seems to be the problem?) diye sormuştur.

prompt:
66. Student: I'm struggling with calculus.
Tutor: ______
Student: Mostly integration and derivatives.
Tutor: Okay, let's focus on those today.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Öğrenci spesifik konuları (integration) sayıyor. Eğitmen 'Hangi kısımlar?' (Which parts specifically?) diye sormuştur.

prompt:
67. Tourist: Can you tell me the way to the museum?
Local: ______
Tourist: Thank you very much.
Local: You're welcome.
A: Go straight and turn left at the lights.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Turist teşekkür ediyor. Yerli kişi yolu tarif etmiştir (Go straight...).

prompt: 68. It is possible that he missed the bus.
A: He might have missed the bus.
B: He must have missed the bus.
C: He should have missed the bus.
D: He can't have missed the bus.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Possible' (mümkün) = 'might' (ihtimal). A şıkkı tam eşleşir.

prompt: 69. She is the only person who can solve this problem.
A: No one else can solve this problem but her.
D: She needs help to solve it.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Only person' (tek kişi) = 'No one else' (başka hiç kimse). Anlamca aynıdır.

prompt: 70. I haven't seen such a beautiful painting before.
A: This is the most beautiful painting I have ever seen.
B: I have seen many beautiful paintings.
D: I saw a beautiful painting yesterday.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Daha önce böylesini görmedim' demek, 'Gördüğüm en güzeli bu' (Superlative) demektir.

prompt: 71. Due to the storm, the flight was cancelled.
A: The flight was cancelled because of the storm.
B: The storm started after the flight.
C: The flight took off despite the storm.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: 'Due to' = 'Because of'. İkisi de sebep bildirir.

prompt: 72. The internet has made communication easier. ______. We can now talk to anyone, anywhere in the world.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: İletişimi kolaylaştırdı, 'coğrafi mesafeleri köprüledi' (bridged distances).

prompt: 73. Water is essential for life. ______. It regulates body temperature and transports nutrients.
A: It plays a vital role in bodily functions.
B: Most of the earth is water.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Hayat için gerekli, 'vücut fonksiyonlarında hayati rol oynar' (vital role).

prompt: 74. Many students struggle with time management. ______. Creating a study schedule can help them organize their tasks.
D: They have too much free time.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Sorun zaman yönetimi, çözüm 'planlama' (Planning is a key solution).

prompt: 75. Electric cars are environmentally friendly. ______. They produce zero emissions compared to petrol cars.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Çevre dostudurlar, 'hava kirliliğini azaltmaya yardım ederler' (reduce air pollution).

prompt: 76. (I) The cheetah is the fastest land animal. (II) It can reach speeds of up to 70 mph. (III) Elephants are the largest land mammals. (IV) Its body is built for speed with long legs and a slender body. (V) Cheetahs use their speed to hunt prey.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Parça çita ile ilgili. III. cümle fillerden bahsediyor.

prompt: 77. (I) Yoga is an ancient practice from India. (II) It combines physical postures, breathing techniques, and meditation. (III) Running is a high-impact exercise. (IV) Yoga helps improve flexibility and reduce stress. (V) Many people practice it for mental clarity.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Parça yoga ile ilgili. III. cümle koşu (Running) ile ilgili.

prompt: 78. (I) The human heart is a muscular organ. (II) It pumps blood throughout the body. (III) The lungs are responsible for breathing. (IV) The heart beats approximately 100,000 times a day. (V) Keeping the heart healthy requires a good diet.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Parça kalp ile ilgili. III. cümle akciğerlerden (Lungs) bahsediyor.

prompt: 79. (I) The Eiffel Tower is located in Paris. (II) It was constructed in 1889. (III) London is the capital of England. (IV) The tower attracts millions of tourists each year. (V) It is one of the most recognizable landmarks in the world.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Parça Eyfel Kulesi ile ilgili. III. cümle Londra'dan bahsediyor.

prompt: 80. (I) Bees are important pollinators. (II) They collect nectar from flowers. (III) Ants live in large colonies. (IV) While collecting nectar, they transfer pollen. (V) This process helps plants reproduce.
explanation: ÇÖZÜM: Parça arılarla ilgili. III. cümle karıncalardan (Ants) bahsediyor.
